spark:position-deletes:v2.notes: Full support as the reference Iceberg implementation

spark:equality-deletes:v2.notes: Full support as the reference Iceberg implementation

spark:merge-on-read:v2.notes: Full merge-on-read support as the reference implementation

spark:merge-on-read:v3.notes: Full merge-on-read support with V3 deletion vectors

spark:schema-evolution:v2.notes: Full schema evolution support as the reference implementation

spark:column-default-values:v2.notes: Column default values are a V3 feature

spark:column-default-values:v3.notes: Full support for column default values in V3

spark:nanosecond-timestamps:v2.notes: Nanosecond timestamps are a V3 feature

spark:nanosecond-timestamps:v3.notes: Full support for nanosecond timestamp types in V3

spark:hidden-partitioning:v2.notes: Full hidden partitioning support as the reference implementation

spark:multi-arg-transforms:v2.notes: Multi-argument transforms are a V3 feature

spark:multi-arg-transforms:v3.notes: Full support for multi-argument transforms in V3

spark:time-travel:v2.notes: Full time travel support by snapshot ID, timestamp, and branch/tag

spark:table-maintenance:v2.notes: Full table maintenance: rewrite_data_files, rewrite_manifests, expire_snapshots, remove_orphan_files

spark:branching-tagging:v2.notes: Full branching and tagging support as the reference implementation

spark:read-support:v2.notes: Full read support as the reference Iceberg implementation

spark:write-insert:v2.notes: INSERT INTO, INSERT OVERWRITE, and DataFrameWriterV2 API supported

spark:write-merge-update-delete:v2.notes: MERGE INTO, UPDATE, DELETE fully supported

spark:catalog-integration:v2.notes: Supports all major Iceberg catalog implementations

spark:catalog-integration:v3.notes: Supports all major Iceberg catalog implementations

spark:aws-glue-catalog:v3.notes: AWS Glue Catalog supported via iceberg-aws module

spark:nessie:v3.notes: Nessie catalog supported via iceberg-nessie module

spark:polaris:v2.notes: Polaris supported via REST Catalog API

spark:polaris:v3.notes: Polaris supported via REST Catalog API

spark:unity-catalog:v2.notes: Unity Catalog supported via REST Catalog API

spark:unity-catalog:v3.notes: Unity Catalog supported via REST Catalog API

spark:jdbc-catalog:v2.notes: JDBC catalog supported via iceberg-jdbc module

spark:jdbc-catalog:v3.notes: JDBC catalog supported via iceberg-jdbc module

flink:position-deletes:v2.notes: Flink supports reading and writing position deletes

flink:position-deletes:v3.notes: Supported with Flink 2.0+ and Iceberg V3

flink:equality-deletes:v2.notes: Flink supports equality deletes for streaming and batch

flink:equality-deletes:v3.notes: Supported with Flink 2.0+ and Iceberg V3

flink:merge-on-read:v2.notes: Flink supports merge-on-read for streaming upserts

flink:merge-on-read:v3.notes: Merge-on-read supported with V3 deletion vectors

flink:schema-evolution:v2.notes: Schema evolution supported; Flink 2.0 adds automatic schema evolution from input streams

flink:schema-evolution:v3.notes: Full schema evolution with dynamic sink in Flink 2.0

flink:column-default-values:v2.notes: Column default values are a V3 feature

flink:column-default-values:v3.notes: V3 column default values support is being added to Flink Iceberg integration
caveats: Support may vary by Flink version

flink:nanosecond-timestamps:v2.notes: Nanosecond timestamps are a V3 feature

flink:nanosecond-timestamps:v3.notes: V3 nanosecond timestamp support is being added to Flink Iceberg integration
caveats: Support may vary by Flink version

flink:hidden-partitioning:v2.notes: Flink does not support hidden partitioning for Iceberg tables

flink:hidden-partitioning:v3.notes: Flink does not support hidden partitioning for Iceberg tables

flink:partition-evolution:v2.notes: Flink does not support partition evolution for Iceberg tables

flink:partition-evolution:v3.notes: Flink does not support partition evolution for Iceberg tables

flink:multi-arg-transforms:v2.notes: Multi-argument transforms are a V3 feature

flink:multi-arg-transforms:v3.notes: V3 multi-argument transform support is being added to Flink Iceberg integration
caveats: Support may vary by Flink version

flink:time-travel:v2.notes: Flink supports reading from specific snapshots but time travel query syntax is limited compared to Spark
caveats: Limited time travel query syntax compared to Spark

flink:time-travel:v3.notes: Snapshot-based reads supported; limited time travel query syntax
caveats: Limited time travel query syntax compared to Spark

flink:table-maintenance:v2.notes: Flink supports some maintenance actions but not the full set available in Spark
caveats: Limited compared to Spark maintenance procedures

flink:table-maintenance:v3.notes: Flink supports some maintenance actions but not the full set available in Spark
caveats: Limited compared to Spark maintenance procedures

flink:branching-tagging:v2.notes: Flink can write to branches but has limited branch/tag management compared to Spark
caveats: Limited branch/tag management API

flink:branching-tagging:v3.notes: Flink can write to branches but has limited branch/tag management compared to Spark
caveats: Limited branch/tag management API

flink:read-support:v2.notes: Full read support for batch and streaming

flink:read-support:v3.notes: Full read support for batch and streaming with V3

flink:write-insert:v2.notes: INSERT INTO supported for both batch and streaming modes

flink:write-insert:v3.notes: INSERT INTO supported with dynamic sink in Flink 2.0

flink:write-merge-update-delete:v2.notes: Flink supports streaming upserts via equality deletes but does not support SQL MERGE/UPDATE/DELETE syntax
caveats: No SQL MERGE/UPDATE/DELETE syntax; uses streaming upsert mode instead

flink:write-merge-update-delete:v3.notes: Flink supports streaming upserts but does not support SQL MERGE/UPDATE/DELETE syntax
caveats: No SQL MERGE/UPDATE/DELETE syntax; uses streaming upsert mode instead

flink:catalog-integration:v3.notes: Supports Hive Metastore, REST Catalog, and custom catalogs
